answers.answer: I have it. I found out at 31 weeks. But mine is just border line and I control it with diet. No soda (well I sneak one once a week lol) no constant snacking like I want to and just watch how much carbs I'm taking in. I was terrified when I found out I had it...but its jot so bad and I'll do anything to keep my baby healthy. I'm 39weeks today so hell be here soon!

question: any mommy in here who has or had gestational diabetes?
title: gestational diabetes
